author: hatakeyamak
body:
#### PR description:

Tuning the looping logic so that we can remove the redundant looping of elements for link tests in PFBlockAlgo. This simple change should make the PFBlockAlgo [one of the most timing consuming part of PF] faster by a factor of x2 with no change in outputs.

#### PR validation:

Check with 100 events from 2018 data that this change yields the identical list of PF candidates.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is not backport.

@bendavid @jsalfeld @jpata
title: Remove redundant looping of elements for link tests in PFBlockAlgo
